info.title: School Management  Server
info.description: This server functions as a school management system, catering to users such as teachers, administrators, and students. Prior to accessing the application, administrators must first register teachers and students within the server. Administrators possess the capability to create, modify, and remove student and teacher profiles, along with managing academic year details, academic terms, programs, subjects, and class levels. Teachers are empowered to generate exams and compose questions for these exams, while students are able to participate in exams. Additionally, administrators hold the authority to publish or unpublish exam results.
